name: [PACKT] Spring MVC Cookbook
tagline: The blog the book and its CloudStreetMarket.com application
body:
### Welcome to the blog of [PACKT] Spring MVC Cookbook
This is the platform where can be found the latest news about the book.
Spring MVC Cookbook will be released during December 2015. Find more details about it online, on the publisher website: 
[Spring MVC Cookbook](https://www.packtpub.com/web-development/spring-mvc-cookbook)

### CloudStreetMarket.com
CloudStreetMarket.com is a scalable Spring MVC showcase web-application developed in the book, chapter after chapter.
The project is maintained and hosted on [Github](https://github.com/alex-bretet/cloudstreetmarket.com) under a GPL license.
The app is virtual trading platform with social capabilities.
More details will be shared soon. 

### Authors and Contributors
@alex-bretet is the author of Spring MVC Cookbook, he also maintains the [CloudStreetMarket.com](https://github.com/alex-bretet/cloudstreetmarket.com) application repository. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
